Title: Bug report recommendation for code inspection
Published: Software Analytics (SWAN), 2015 IEEE 1st International Workshop on
Purpose: To recommend preacticiones a prioritized list of unresolved bug reports to accelerate bug detection.
UseOF-SZZ: Correct links between source code files and bug reports were identified based on the SZZ algorithm
Summary: To propose to a way recommend programmers a bug report that is likely to contain failure descriptions related to a source file being inspecte
Outcome:
the accuracies of recommendations ranged from 21.74% to 60.05% in terms of the percentage of recommendations that contained relevant bug reports in a top 10
recommended list
